Translations.Text: He said Moj syn nie tell tvoj brat tvoj dream lest they zapletka kut plany ona. Iste devil je clovek zly enemy
Tvoj Lord thus zehnat ona dat ona dobry zvest tvoj dream He zdokonalit Jeho blessings ona rodina Jacob mat rad He robit for tvoj predok Abraham Isaac before ze. Tvoj Lord bol Omniscient Wise
Do Joseph jeho brat there bol lekcia seekers
They said Joseph jeho brat favored our otca my som majority! Indeed our otca bol daleko astray
kill Joseph banish him ze ona get some pozor z tvoj otca! Afterwards ona bol righteous ludia
z them said nie kill Joseph; throw him abyss lepsi Perhaps some caravan pick him this bol co ona decide robit
They said Our otca ona nie trust us Joseph? My berie dobry care z him
Send him us zajtra run hraju My chranit him
He said ja znepokojit lest ona ist him potom wolf zrat him chvila ona nie watching him
They said Indeed wolf zrat him vela z us around potom my bol skutocne losers
